Plot: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.
Title: Out of the Furnace
Actors: Woody Harrelson, Dendrie Taylor, Carl Ciarfalio, Nancy Mosser
tomatoConsensus: While it may not make the most of its incredible cast, Out of the Furnace is still so packed with talent that it's hard to turn away.
